attributes.action: Not reduce the national speed limit to 50mph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the announcement that the government is  planning to reduce the national speed limit to 50 miles per hour, we the undersigned oppose this, since it will make no difference to road deaths and the cut in carbon emissions is so insignificantly small it's laughable.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Not reduce the national speed limit to 50mph."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20803


Prime Minister's Office
